root.Summary: 1: Zhu J, Dubois A, Ge Y, Olson JA, Ren X. Application of human haploid cellgenetic screening model in identifying the genes required for resistance toenvironmental toxicants: Chlorpyrifos as a case study. J Pharmacol ToxicolMethods. 2015 Nov-Dec;76:76-82. doi: 10.1016/j.vascn.2015.08.154. Epub 2015 Aug20. PubMed PMID: 26299976.
